website_summaries.verdict: Offers many of the same filing and support features, like audit support, as the other big tax prep software companies, all in an inviting and intuitive way.
pros: Variety of options offered for varying types of businesses
Offers business tax prep products for sole proprietors, partnerships, C and S corporations, all at the same price
New “freelancers” product added for 2019 tax year
cons: Users have opted for the more expensive options for fear of missing out on all features

website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you have uncomplicated taxes and want to make the most of your money and time.
pros: Ideal for basic taxes and optimizing up to 350 deductions
Allows importing of last year's taxes, 1099, and W-2 forms, even from other popular tax software
Includes a Schedule A that makes itemizing easy
cons: Not ideal for handling more complicated reporting, such as mortgage interest, Earned Income Credit, and Schedule Cs

customer_reviews.title: Covers many common schedules
customer_reviews.text: The descriptions of the various versions of tax prep software try to make you believe that if you have a "complicated" situation you need one of their deluxe versions. This is generally not true as the deluxe versions just offer more hand holding or add consultation features. I've been using this version for years and it covers schedules A, B, D with no problems and has 5 free federal files. States are extra. So before you pay up for an expensive version go to the H&R Block web site and check exactly which schedules are included with each version and buy only what you need.
customer_reviews.author: H Davis

customer_reviews.title: Better than TurboTax
customer_reviews.text: At least H&R Block had the gonads to say their software would work with Windows 7, and it did !! TurboTax has been bought by Microsoft to force Windows 10 on us that still have to use Windows 7. I have relatives that have gone out and bought new computers with Win 10, because of TurboTax BS about making us safe. You probably wont publish this because it runs down another product..........but I said what I thought the review needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lovell K. Henson

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: I switched to H&R Block basic a few years ago when TurboTax changed its pricing structure. This software is easy to use and has all the forms you need, including those for interest, dividends, stock sale, etc. There is no online help, though. If you need that, then get the Deluxe version. If you know your way around income tax forms, the basic version is a no-brainer. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: hb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've been using H&R Block products to do my taxes since the 1970s. It has never let me down. Had one recent year where I had to hire a CPA for my Fed Taxes and I also used the Block software for comparison. H&R Block got me a bigger refund than the CPA and cost me a lot less too.
customer_reviews.author: Bill L

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I do have a big complaint about this software, it doesn't work on Windows XP. I know, nobody runs XP anymore, it didn't say it worked on it, but I was hoping. However it didn't even try to install, it saw XP and said no, we're not going here... I had to use a different machine, one with the vile Windows 10 and it works fine on it. My taxes are not complicated, just half a step up from stupid simple, which means I need tax software. This was the least expensive I found, and outside of not working on my preferred OS, which is admittedly near obsolete, it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: MikeW

customer_reviews.title: I Really Like It
customer_reviews.text: I prefer to complete my own federal income tax preparation each year so I've used H&R Block Tax software for decades and have found it to be most reliable - it's never failed me. I haven't used their companion "state" filing tax software since I live in FL where no personal income tax filing is required nor have I used other tax computation software products so I can't give any comparison only my recommendation that "H&R Block" - Basic works great for retirees who don't have loads of deductions and complicated filing forms. This tax software is easy to use with e-filing included at no extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: Bill @ W1WLH

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING!
customer_reviews.text: I have used the HR Block Software downloaded from Amazon since 2013. First purchase, I used deluxe because I sold and bought a new home. After that the basic worked. No glitches, excellent program and data from prior year is easily import to subsequent years . Best Program at a reasonable price! Thank you Amazon for providing this to your customers.
customer_reviews.author: John, FLL

customer_reviews.title: No issues!
customer_reviews.text: My taxes are relatively simple. The software is reasonably priced, loaded, and performed as expected, had my taxes done quickly and return came fast. I am not a fan of Turbo Tax because of the cost and other things Intuit does to reach into your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Cushman Ken

customer_reviews.title: H&R Block Tax Software Basic 2019
customer_reviews.text: Had to do the form three times to get it correct. I assumed it was saving my data when I pressed save button W ;; assume broken down is ass=u=me. After third printing got it correct and finally sent off. Once finally correct I was able to email to IRS took a few hours for acceptance by IRS and less then a week for refund. It did teach be a lesson I have known for decades computer/programs are only as good as the data accepted. Output is only as good as the data the computer has accepted.
customer_reviews.author: jjm

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Several free filings. Step by step instruction, every step of th way. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: REVIEWER71

customer_reviews.title: Expensive to Upgrade to State Version
customer_reviews.text: I've used this software for almost decades (when it was called tax cut). It is really easy to use and I've never had a problem with the accuracy of my return. I bought this license for my daughter who worked an internship in another state and has one W2 and one 1099. It turned out she needed to file a state return and it was almost $40 to upgrade. That is fairly close to amount she will get back from the state return. State returns used to be free for the first state.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Boss

customer_reviews.title: Erroneous Tax Return software
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this software for years and have no problems until this year. I found inaccurate guidance and contacted Block to inform them their program contained a tax related error. I have been calling the repeatedly to find out when they will fix it so I can complete my return. So far, I have been stymied despite being told they're elevated team would get back to me within 3 days; it's been three weeks. If I can't trust the tax accuracy of the program, how can Block be a reliable taxfilerm
customer_reviews.author: Artie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Regular Federal TAx Filings
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for at least 10 years...before H&R Block purchased the product from Tax Cut. It is simple to use, accurate, and offers 5 IRS electronic filings. The basic version if Federal Tax only...no state option. Likewise it has limitation for complicated filing particularly foreign investments. If that is you...call your CPA.
customer_reviews.author: Dawon

customer_reviews.title: Cannot activate software
customer_reviews.text: I have been unable to activate the software or file my return. I receive error code 20 from H&R Block, which indicates an SSL or certificate problem. This is a known problem, with a technical note on H&R Block's website. If the steps in the technical note don't work, H&R Block says to call technical support. I have twice. Technical support is lacking, having no clue about the problem and needing to escalate to a higher level. I've spent more time on the problem than the software is worth. Don't buy the software. Might as well use free software offered by the IRS.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: unending marketing email spam. stay away
customer_reviews.text: The software works fine, is a bit clunky but spat out a useable return. I had to unsubscribe from multiple marketing emails multiple times, there was no opt-out available in the original form, and you need to use an email to get updates on your e-file. Shady and trashy business practice, will not buy H&R Block software again.

customer_reviews.title: Slightly better than free
customer_reviews.text: Credit Karma offers free tax returns unfortunately they don't allow a particular form I need for an Alaska Dividend. The good thing about HR block is that after a few years you don't have to enter much information. It carries over from last year.
customer_reviews.author: AK zero°bike

customer_reviews.title: Support hung up on me
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I am a degreed accountant. I called to report a problem - a bug - using the software. Agent asked me to hold while she researched it. 30 minutes later they ended the call. Sorry, life it too short. My last year with HR Block.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Cie

customer_reviews.title: Great deal when you take advantage of the gift card.
customer_reviews.text: I use H&B program from Amazon every year. I always take advantage of the Gift Card deal, so I have essentially paid zero dollars for a very good software deal. I've researched turbo tax, etc. and this program meets all my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Cal Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Tax Software For Simple Returns
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for years and Amazon had the best price with super fast download. Had it running in just a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike CFL

customer_reviews.title: some thing that works
customer_reviews.text: did not work did not take the code sent to my email H&R BLOCK phone # sent with email can not use to busy I bough the CD early instead 2019 copy you sent me the 2018 Amazon is better than this o is H&R Block but this could not be any worse
customer_reviews.author: Janice Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Right price. The Basic version has been fine for me for years. I have numerous stock trades, no problem. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: SN in CT

customer_reviews.title: Tax Return Program.
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a tax program should. Our tax return was simple so not sure how long s would work on a complex one.
customer_reviews.author: Luan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Been using this software for many years and have always had an easy time with it and accurate returns.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: This product makes it super easy to complete your income tax return. I use it every year.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: H&R verses Turbo Tax
customer_reviews.text: I bought both H&R Basic 2019 and Turbo Tax 2019. I prepared my 2018 taxes with both of tax software. Found the H&R Block software less than one half the price as Turbo Tax. Plus, H&R Block was faster and easier to navigate. Have used both tax software over the years, but have finally settled on H&R Block.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HANDLES MOST TAX PROBLEMS EFFICIENTLY
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE USED BLOCK SOFTWARE FOR YEARS AND HAVE NOT BEEN DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: R. Archer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Took me 10 mts. to do my family taxes. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian R.

customer_reviews.title: 39.95 for state return
customer_reviews.text: I purchased HR Block Basic software. The State software would cost 39.95. If you are going to also going to file a state return, I suggest you consider " H&R Block Tax Software Deluxe + State 2019 with 4% Refund Bonus Offer [Amazon Exclusive] [PC Download]" instead. Note to HR Block and Amazon: Please consider a Basic and State package.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Heuring

customer_reviews.title: THAT was a first!
customer_reviews.text: It did my taxes. Then during "uninstall", it crashed my hard drive. So now I'm not sure my taxes are done right.
customer_reviews.author: john holland

customer_reviews.title: I Have used Tax-cut/H&R Block for last twenty years
customer_reviews.text: I like it. it is simple and easy to use. good value
customer_reviews.author: Seven Lake

customer_reviews.title: 14.99  give away
customer_reviews.text: This program had me paying state and Fed. money. When to free Turbotax software. I am getting a refund from the fed. and state.
customer_reviews.author: LEROY SIMPSON

customer_reviews.title: Works Great !!!
customer_reviews.text: This product has worked for me for many years, very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Rick Myers

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with H&R Block Tax Software
customer_reviews.text: I have used H&R Block for several years with mixed results. Last year, I uncovered a bug in their software that took them a long time to recognize was real and fix. So far this year I found that their program would not import my data from last year's return. Their technical support person could not help with this.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unable to connect to server
customer_reviews.text: I filled out my whole tax return but when I submitted the registration it was unable to connect to the server. I have tried several times with no success. Please help.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie O

customer_reviews.title: Version switch
customer_reviews.text: I had "Mac Version" checked when I hit, "add to cart", but ended up with the PC version, which I'm sure is awesome, but not for a Mac user. I haven't, can't and won't activate. Looks like no way to refund for what seems like an Amazon issue.
customer_reviews.author: merrilldca

customer_reviews.title: Prefer H&R Block
customer_reviews.text: I think it is the most user friendly tax software.,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not allow filing as unmarried for tax purposes
customer_reviews.text: Product does not allow you to file unmarried for tax purposes (which happens when you have a child and live apart from your spouse after June 30th).
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for last 7 or 8 years to do my own taxes.....efile capability terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent softwear, easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to follow instructions. This makes tax time much more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Gift Card

product_meta.title: H&R Block Tax Software Basic 2019 with 4% Refund Bonus Offer [Amazon Exclusive] [PC Download]
product_meta.description:
Platform:PC Download| Edition:BasicH&R Block Basic Tax Software offers everything simple for first-time tax filers needed to complete their federal taxes, including FREE tax advice via online chat.

Minimum System Requirements:

 * Operating System: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
 * Processor: 32-bit
feature_bullets: Five free federal e-files and unlimited federal preparation and printing
Step-by-step Q&A and guidance on all available credits and deductions
Quickly import your W-2, 1099, 1098, last year's personal tax return
Free live product help via chat - or get tax help from a tax expert for a fee
Help Center has more than 13,000 articles, frequently asked questions, and tips in case you get stuck while preparing your taxes
Must allocate all or a portion of Federal refund to Amazon.com Gift Card to receive 4% Refund Bonus

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
